properties.name: spring.nats.host
properties.description: This NATs Server host. Default to localhost.

properties.name: spring.nats.port
properties.description: This NATs Server port. Default to 4222.

properties.name: movie.api-server
properties.description: This api-server can be obtain in your https://rapidapi.com/ profile. Default to: https://imdb8.p.rapidapi.com/title/get-ratings?tconst=ID. The ID will be replaced, so it's necessary

properties.name: movie.header-host
properties.description: This header-host can be obtain in your https://rapidapi.com/ profile. Default to: imdb8.p.rapidapi.com.

properties.name: movie.header-key
properties.description: This header-key can be obtain in your https://rapidapi.com/ profile.
